name: Crimson Oath Devotion
prereq: Knight Reclaimant Dedication; Ability To Cast Focus Spells
summary: You've made the Crimson Oath a part of yourself; you mumble it in your sleep and recite it under your breath as you march.
description:
You've made the Crimson Oath a part of yourself; you mumble it in your sleep and recite it under your breath as you march. You become an expert in divine spell attacks and spell DCs. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
